message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to accept that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $10,500. Could you do $11,000? That would be a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. Would you be willing to accept that price?
